entry.title: [SQ] Looking for history book recommendations. I'm trying to read more real books and
entry.content:
Looking for history book recommendations. I'm trying to read more real books and history is always fun. I'm open to any really good books, but I'd specifically like
* Rome (Been rewatching Rome on HBO Max) * Indian history, esp Partition. Thats a big blank spot on my history knowledge * Economic history is fun. I always enjoy hearing about the behind the scenes factors that led to our modern world.
I usually prefer larger scope to smaller, though there have been notable exceptions. Not usually into biographies but willing to give them a shot.
